greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of compositions of n such that every part is divisible by number of parts.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: G.f.: 1 + Sum_{n>=1} (1 + x^n)^(n-1) * x^n. - _Paul D. Hanna_, Jul 09 2019
a(n) = Sum_{d|n} binomial(n/d-1, d-1) for n>0 with a(0) = 1. - _Paul D. Hanna_, Apr 25 2018
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 03 2008
ext: More terms from _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Apr 09 2009
